products.name: Chicken 65 Masala (சிக்கன் 65 மசாலா)
products.description: Give your chicken the authentic South Indian restaurant-style taste
products.paragraphDesc: Give your chicken the authentic South Indian restaurant-style taste with our Homemade Chicken 65 Masala. Made from freshly ground spices, free from preservatives and artificial colors. Perfect for crispy, spicy, and flavorful Chicken 65 every time!
products.howtouse: Mix 100 gram of AS Chicken 65 masala with 1kg chicken add one egg and  add 25 gram of ginger garlic paste. Marinate chicken pieces for 30 minutes and deep fry till golden brown.
